creditline: Gift of funds from Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: roughly spherical bell with 3 clappers topped by a carved quadruped standing with back legs and front legs carved as one, with human head; reddish mottled brown; glossy patina
dimension: 13 7/16 x 9 x 6 3/4 in. (34.13 x 22.86 x 17.15 cm) (including attached base)
title: Ritual Bell
